explains: n. 才华，聪慧；光亮，光辉

sentences.en: She loved his brilliance and his generous heart.
sentences.cn: 她爱他的才华横溢和心地宽厚。

sentences.en: It demonstrated the brilliance of China's ancient culture.
sentences.cn: 它显示了中国古代文化的光辉。

sentences.en: His extraordinary brilliance as a critic is really just part of the experience of reading him.
sentences.cn: 他作为评论家的非凡才华实际上只是阅读他的经历的一部分。
